short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enable ClickOnce support in browser for Xactimate/XactContents online Estimate Writer w/o instructions for mandatory helper install.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows users of Xactimate and XactContents online the ability to open and view or edit estimates.  This version is specifically for IT organizations looking to script the install and skip the user-friendly help instructions that normally are displayed when first installing this extension.
